A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Despite this movie's flaws\, Star Wars the Last Jedi has too many great moments that for me over power the Plot holes in this film.  Heck\, if this movie fixed 3 to 4 things\, i would say it was a great film.  Sadly this film is not all it could have been.  Star Wars the Last Jedi gets a B-.
